alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A shower with strong wind gusts will impact portions of southeastern Somerset, southern Worcester and northern Accomack Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower over Westover, or 7 miles south of Princess Anne, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This showers will be near... Pocomoke City and West Pocomoke around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this shower include Horntown, Boxiron, Oriole, Cokesbury, Goodwill, Public Landing, Fairmount, Upper Hill, Greenbackville and Rehobeth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
